name: Cucumber Castle
description:
Here is my first dip into the vast ocean that is the Unreal Engine. Explore a beautiful 3D medieval forest terrain, created using the new Unreal 5 megascan library, with real-time lighting to bring it to life! Collect cucumbers scattered throughout the map to increase your score and motivate exploration!

Created and Programmed by: Daniel Boghossian

Development Time: 1 week
